title: Reginald Pulley
text:
Hey, I’m Reginald Pulley! I am an American politics Ph.D. student at the University of Maryland, studying Race and Ethnicity Politics (REP). My research focuses on exploring the intra-group differences among Black Americans and how these differences affect their evaluations of public policy.
Before the University of Maryland, I began on my Ph.D. journey at Georgia State University, where I earned my Master’s in Political Science. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Political Science from Catawba College in North Carolina.
